title: 'Baying Mob' (with Bob Blackman MP)
itunes:title: 'Baying Mob' (with Bob Blackman MP)
description:
Conservative MP Bob Blackman, Executive Secretary of the 1922 Committee, condemns the 'baying mob' who attacked Keir Starmer. But he tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts it was not necessarily Boris Johnson's comments about Jimmy Savile that fueled the protesters.

Plus on dirty Russian money, Liberal Democrat peer Susan Kramer discusses her successful Lords amendment that aims to prevent the U.K.'s new freeports being targeted.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Conservative MP Bob Blackman, Executive Secretary of the 1922 Committee, condemns the 'baying mob' who attacked Keir Starmer. But he tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts it was not necessarily Boris Johnson's comments about Jimmy Savile that fueled the protesters.

Plus on dirty Russian money, Liberal Democrat peer Susan Kramer discusses her successful Lords amendment that aims to prevent the U.K.'s new freeports being targeted.

itunes:author: Bloomberg
